com.priceminister.account

Interface AccountRule

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerAccountRule

    public interface AccountRule
    Checks if the requested operation is permitted.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean withdrawPermitted(java.lang.Double resultingAccountBalance)
      Checks if the resulting account balance after a withdrawal is OK for the specific type of account.

    • Method Detail

      • withdrawPermitted

        boolean withdrawPermitted(java.lang.Double resultingAccountBalance)
        Checks if the resulting account balance after a withdrawal is OK for the specific type of account.
        Parameters:
        resultingAccountBalance - - the amount resulting of the withdrawal
        Returns:
        true if the operation is permitted, false otherwise
